summary: Chapter 3 is up!
title: Chapter 3 is up!
body:
Fic: Provide Me

Fandom: Marvel

Relationships: Steve Rogers & Tony Stark, Steve Rogers & Natasha Romanov, Ensemble Avengers

Summary: Tony wakes up a lot younger than he’s supposed to be. The team try to figure out how to handle this.
Tension headaches, a little heartache, and a lot of learning ensues.

I’m really excited to continue telling this story! Thank you so much to everyone who’s commented or left kudos so far. I promise there’s a lot more to come xx

Excerpt from Chapter 3:

“Band meeting,” Clint said from the back of the room, in a clipped New Zealand accent. Steve assumed it was one of the references he peppered his speech with whenever Steve was around, in an attempt to force him into consuming more ‘essential’ culture.

“Thank you all for coming,” he said, seating himself at the head of the briefing table.

“How serious is this business?” Bruce asked, shuffling some papers. “I ask because of the lack of red flashing lights; I have a project –"

“It’s not necessarily an emergency, but it is pretty important.”

“And true to form, Tony isn’t here,” Clint said, propping his feet up on the table. “I suppose he’s snorting cocaine off a pretty important model’s asscrack?”

“Clint.” Steve refused to rise to the bait. “Tony’s actually the issue.”

“Then shouldn’t he be here?” Bruce said, and Steve’s heart went out to him for the concern immediately apparent in his face. “I mean, we shouldn’t be talking about him without –“

“No, Bruce, I don’t mean he’s done anything wrong. He’s – and nobody panic when I say this, like I said, not an emergency – sort of in trouble.” Everyone sat up a little straighter. Steve felt a swell of pride at the team they’d built.

“He was fine last night,” Sam said, pausing in the folding of a paper airplane. “We were talking over some improvements to my wings. Seemed normal.”

“He didn’t check in at the lab this morning, but I assumed he was sleeping in. Is he OK?”

“Well, he’s –“ Steve sighed, glad he’d only have to explain this once. “Please just bear with me. He’s seven years old.”

Read more

summary: Hiya love! So my dumb ass got a v bad sore throat/fever/cold and guess what? I have a show in Monday and a lead on vocal flash...
question: Hiya love! So my dumb ass got a v bad sore throat/fever/cold and guess what? I have a show in Monday and a lead on vocal flash mob. I gotta get well asap. So I was wondering if you could write something about Tony taking care of you when sick? I need much many moral support? thank you so much bby ilysm take care and don't get sick like I did lol 💜💜
answer:
Masterlist

Join my Taglist

Prompt lists

  • First off I’m so sorry you got sick and I hope you feel better before your show bby! Rest plz sleep it off trust me I’m like a grandmother I know what I’m doing
  • Tony is the dumbest man alive
  • He seems like a genius but he is the
  • D U M B E S T
  • When you start sneezing and coughing he literally panics bc he thinks you have pneumonia
  • He takes your temperature and tries to hide that he’s terrified but you’re literally on fire
  • He has you lay down and he wraps you in ten blankets
  • He makes you into a lil burrito and then tucks you in so that you can’t go anywhere
  • Not like you can move anyways whoops
  • He goes to the stove and is like yeah imma make soup for my bby I’m the best
  • But then it comes time to
  • Make the soup
  • He has no idea wtf he’s doing
  • He googles it bc he asked Steve but Steve just laughed at him and left
  • He figures out that he has to turn on the stove, so it takes him about ten minutes to figure out how to do that
  • The man is a mechanical genius but ask him to literally turn a dial on your stove and he’s gonna need a moment
  • The recipe is like you need a pot and he doesn’t realize that they gave specific measurements for the pot size so he grabs the biggest pot they have and uses that
  • Someone help him
  • He tosses all the ingredients in and uses way too much salt tbh he misread the measurements but it’s okay
  • He realizes that maybe he didn’t need an industrial sized pot bc the soup only takes up about 1/24th of the pot
  • He ladles some into a mug for you and grabs some crackers to go with it
  • He brings them up to your room and sees you laying there crying bc your throat hurts really bad
  • He unwraps you from your blanket cocoon and feeds you some soup
  • The soup ends up helping your sore throat a lot and you get tucked back into a burrito
  • He lays in bed with you and plays with your hair until you fall asleep
  • He’s slowly learning how to not be super super dumb

  • He ladles some into a mug for you and grabs some crackers to go with it
  • He brings them up to your room and sees you laying there crying bc your throat hurts really bad
  • He unwraps you from your blanket cocoon and feeds you some soup
  • The soup ends up helping your sore throat a lot and you get tucked back into a burrito
  • He lays in bed with you and plays with your hair until you fall asleep
  • He’s slowly learning how to not be super super dumb

Masterlist

Join my Taglist

Prompt lists

  • First off I’m so sorry you got sick and I hope you feel better before your show bby! Rest plz sleep it off trust me I’m like a grandmother I know what I’m doing
  • Tony is the dumbest man alive
  • He seems like a genius but he is the
  • D U M B E S T
  • When you start sneezing and coughing he literally panics bc he thinks you have pneumonia
  • He takes your temperature and tries to hide that he’s terrified but you’re literally on fire
  • He has you lay down and he wraps you in ten blankets
  • He makes you into a lil burrito and then tucks you in so that you can’t go anywhere
  • Not like you can move anyways whoops
  • He goes to the stove and is like yeah imma make soup for my bby I’m the best
  • But then it comes time to
  • Make the soup
  • He has no idea wtf he’s doing
  • He googles it bc he asked Steve but Steve just laughed at him and left
  • He figures out that he has to turn on the stove, so it takes him about ten minutes to figure out how to do that
  • The man is a mechanical genius but ask him to literally turn a dial on your stove and he’s gonna need a moment
  • The recipe is like you need a pot and he doesn’t realize that they gave specific measurements for the pot size so he grabs the biggest pot they have and uses that
  • Someone help him
  • He tosses all the ingredients in and uses way too much salt tbh he misread the measurements but it’s okay
  • He realizes that maybe he didn’t need an industrial sized pot bc the soup only takes up about 1/24th of the pot
  • He ladles some into a mug for you and grabs some crackers to go with it
  • He brings them up to your room and sees you laying there crying bc your throat hurts really bad
  • He unwraps you from your blanket cocoon and feeds you some soup
  • The soup ends up helping your sore throat a lot and you get tucked back into a burrito
  • He lays in bed with you and plays with your hair until you fall asleep
  • He’s slowly learning how to not be super super dumb

blog.name: 27dragons
blog.title: 27dragons
blog.description: Mom, editor, writer, geek.

summary: 31 for Rhodey and Tony!!! " You may be an idiot but you're my idiot"
question: 31 for Rhodey and Tony!!! " You may be an idiot but you're my idiot"
answer:
“You may be an idiot but you’re my idiot”

Tony had gone through three roommates before Rhodey. Sooner or later, Tony would do something unforgivable, and they’d transfer. The last time, Tony had forgotten to mention the hole he’d made in the floor and his roommate had broken an ankle.

Rhodey had stuck around for almost a whole semester. He’d still been there after Tony had gone without sleep for two weeks in a frantic and furious quest to prove one of his professors wrong, for which he’d had to essentially invent an entire new sub-branch of mathematics. He’d still been there after Tony had infested the dorm with self-replicating miniature robots. And he was still there after a slight miscalculation in hose pressure had resulted in their entire room getting coated in a layer of motor oil.

“Just… get it over with,” Tony finally said, as they were cleaning all the room’s nooks and crannies at three in the morning. “Rip off the bandaid.”

“Tones, I’m tired,” Rhodey sighed. “What are you talking about?”

“When are you leaving?”

Rhodey rolled his eyes and cuffed Tony affectionately on the back of the head. “You may be an idiot, but you’re my idiot,” he said. “Now hand me that bucket.”
